name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a long, straight blade with a simple hilt wrapped in leather. It has a sharp edge and a sturdy construction.

special_weapon_skills.sword_skill: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when equipped.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made from iron
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of wood and wrapped in leather for a firm grip. The pommel is simple and functional.

name: Steel Helmet
description: A sturdy helmet made of steel
looks: The helmet is made of smooth steel with a silver tint. It has a visor that can be opened and closed.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of gauntlets made from sturdy steel
looks: The gauntlets are made of solid steel with a polished surface. They have fingered sections and metal plates on the back of the hand for added protection.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a double-edged blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a sharp point. The hilt is made of leather wrapped around the metal. It is medium in length and balanced for easy handling.

special_effects.critical_strike: Has a chance to land a critical hit, dealing double damage.

name: Crystal Staff
description: A powerful staff made from a rare crystal that enhances spellcasting abilities.
looks: The Crystal Staff is a long, slender rod made from a deep blue crystal. It is adorned with intricate engravings and a large crystal orb at the top.

special_weapon_skills.staff_mastery: Increases damage and accuracy with staffs.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of spells cast with the staff.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A small dagger made of silver, suitable for close-quarters combat.
looks: The silver dagger has a short and slender blade, with a hilt made of polished silver. It is lightweight and easy to handle.

name: Steel Helmet
description: A sturdy helmet made of steel
looks: The helmet is made of smooth steel with a silver tint. It has a visor that can be opened and closed.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Emerald Necklace
description: A beautiful necklace adorned with a large emerald in the center.
looks: The Emerald Necklace features a silver chain with a pendant that holds a large emerald. The emerald is faceted, reflecting light and giving off a vibrant green color.

special_effects.luck_boost: Increases the luck stat of the wearer by 3.

name: Iron Sword
description: A reliable iron sword that is perfect for slicing and dicing enemies.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single sharp edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_effects.bleeding: Has a chance to cause bleeding damage over time.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy and sturdy gauntlets made of steel.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick steel plates and have a hinged design that allows for ease of movement. They have small spikes on the knuckles for added protection.

name: Elven Bow
description: A finely crafted bow made from enchanted wood, favored by elven archers for its accuracy and speed.
looks: The Elven Bow has a sleek design, with elegant curves and intricate carvings depicting nature scenes. It is made from a light-colored wood that seems to shimmer and glow in the sunlight.

special_weapon_skils.archery: Increases damage and accuracy with bows.
